official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide equity in medical benefits for retirees in multiemployer plans.
short_title: Multiemployer Retirees Medical Equity Benefits Act of 1993

summary.text: Multiemployer Retirees Medical Equity Benefits Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the use of multiemployer plan contributions for retiree health benefits.

titles.title: Multiemployer Retirees Medical Equity Benefits Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide equity in medical benefits for retirees in multiemployer plans.
